p: During storage days (0, 7, 15, 30, 60, and 90), 10 g of each cheese sample was mixed for 2 min in 20 ml chloroform and 40 ml methanol. Then, 20 ml chloroform and 20 ml methanol were added to the homogenized mixture consecutively. Vacuum filtration using Whatman No. 1 filter paper was applied to separate solid from liquid. After preparing a transparent solution, the solvent was removed by rotary evaporator (Bligh & Dyer, 1959). The prepared lipid samples were sealed in opaque bottles and stored at −80°C until use.
